document_data.mainbody: '''Calimite''' was a famous breed of [[light warhorse]] known for its speed and endurance.
document_data.Description: A Calimite was considered a beautiful horse. It had an easily recognizable head shape with an arched neck and a raised tail carriage. It had large eyes and could come in a variety of colors, such as chestnut or gray.
document_data.History: Originating in the [[Calim Desert]], legends told that Calimites were granted their speed by the [[djinni]] [[Calim]] himself.
document_data.Ecology: Calimites were very expensive horses, costing an average of sixteen hundred [[gold piece]]s.
document_data.Trivia: To call a [[Calishite]] a Calimite was a severe insult.
